lead_paragraph: Russian swimmers Vladimir Morozov and Nikita Lobintsev have launched an appeal against the ruling banning them from next month's Rio Olympic Games even though they have never failed a doping test.

headline.print_headline: Swimming-Two Russians Launch Appeal Against Rio Ban
headline.main: Swimming-Two Russians Launch Appeal Against Rio Ban

snippet: Russian swimmers Vladimir Morozov and Nikita Lobintsev have launched an appeal against the ruling banning them from next month's Rio Olympic Games even though they have never failed a doping test....
